| Length Restrictions                                                                                             |                                             |       |
| A train exceeding 205m/32SLU in length will foul 911 points when standing at TL300 on the Up Hither Green       |                                             |       |
| Departure Road                                                                                                  |                                             |       |
| Therefore, junction margins must be based on train’s departure time at Hither Green                             |                                             |       |
| Planning Note                                                                                                   |                                             |       |
| Trains may only be planned to call at Platform 1 during times of engineering work or other circumstances agreed |                                             |       |
| in advance with the TOC. This is due to station staff needing to be present to unlock the anti-tresspass gates  |                                             |       |
